title.narrative: Soutien au déplacement d'une délégation du ministère des Sciences et Technologies du Vietnam
Travel Support to Vietnam's Ministry of Science and Technology Delegation

description.narrative:
This project will provide partial funds to support the travel costs for a delegation from Vietnam's Ministry of Science and Technology (MOST) to attend meetings at IDRC's Asia Regional Office in December 2013. MOST serves as IDRC's government coordinating agency in Vietnam and the focal point on the Asian Partnership on Avian Influenza Research. MOST has also received two IDRC grants for work on international cooperation in science and technology.
The MOST delegation will visit IDRC's New Delhi office to meet with the Regional Director and other officials to discuss IDRC's 1990 Memorandum of Understanding with Vietnam and 1993 Letter of Understanding.
The MOST delegation will include: -Dr Le Thanh Binh, Deputy Director General, Department of International Cooperation -Ms Luu Nam Phuong, Head of the America and South Pacific Division, Department of International Cooperation -Ms Do Thi Phuong Thao, Official, Department of Planning and General Affairs and -Ms Ngo Thi Van, Official, Department of Technology Appraisal, Examination and Assessment.
The team will also visit IDRC research recipients in New Delhi to learn about their experience and areas of work. They will also meet with IDRC's coordinating agency, India's Department of Economic Affairs at the Ministry of Finance, to obtain technical and policy guidance.
